casebody.head_matter:
Margaret A. LUCAS, Individually, as Widow and Wrongful Death Beneficiary, and as Personal Representative of the Estate of John A. Lucas, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 16-1264.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 19, 2017.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United State Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
